settings.title: OAuth Passport Settings
settings.redirect_url_label: Redirect URL (copy to your OAuth server)
settings.redirect_url_help: Copy this URL to your OAuth server's allowed redirect URLs
settings.replace_login_signup_label: Replace login/signup buttons with OAuth button only
settings.fullscreen_popup_label: Use fullscreen popup for OAuth authentication
settings.fullscreen_popup_help: When enabled, the OAuth login will open in a fullscreen popup. If this is enabled, the width and height settings will be ignored.
settings.popup_width_help: Set the width of the OAuth popup window. This setting will be ignored if "Use fullscreen popup for OAuth authentication" is enabled.
settings.popup_height_help: Set the height of the OAuth popup window. This setting will be ignored if "Use fullscreen popup for OAuth authentication" is enabled.
